title: The Intelligence - “The political and psychological fallout will last a very long time”—chaos in America’s Capitol
summary:
Also on the daily podcast: Argentina’s momentous abortion ruling, and the history and influence of “Ethio-jazz”“The political and psychological fallout will last a very long time”—chaos in America’s CapitolAFTER PREVIOUSLY unthinkable scenes played out in Washington’s legislature, we ask what the violence will mean for the president, Republican lawmakers and American democracy.
Argentina’s move to liberalise its abortion laws reflects slowly changing attitudes across Latin America, and may spur wider change.
And examining the history of Ethio-jazz, a unique musical melting pot.
Runtime: 20minListen on: Apple Podcasts | Spotify | Google | Stitcher | TuneInFor full access to print, digital and audio editions of The Economist, subscribe here www.economist.com/intelligenceoffer
paragraphs: Also on the daily podcast: Argentina’s momentous abortion ruling, and the history and influence of “Ethio-jazz”
“The political and psychological fallout will last a very long time”—chaos in America’s Capitol

AFTER PREVIOUSLY unthinkable scenes played out in Washington’s legislature, we ask what the violence will mean for the president, Republican lawmakers and American democracy. Argentina’s move to liberalise its abortion laws reflects slowly changing attitudes across Latin America, and may spur wider change. And examining the history of Ethio-jazz, a unique musical melting pot. Runtime: 20min
